fun cheap, original mechanics, great story telling , and really good voice acting

I was truly blown away with how great this game was. I went in with really no expectations, all I knew is that it was a popular game a lot of people liked, so I decided to try it out for myself. Such a good piece of storytelling, world building, characters, and of course, the gameplay and puzzles that made me feel dumb
This game is great, very fun and still holds up 10 years later!

Solving the puzzles with the portal gun is amazing. Story gives the very unique vibe which doesn't distract you when brainstorming. Gameplay is smooth and fun with a [b]great learning curve[/b] that is not making you read or watch a tutorial to make things go right way. The story will take you something around from [b]5.5 to 9 hours[/b] depending on how fast you will be passing through the puzzles.
Game features [b]separate cooperative story for 2 players[/b] that lasts about [b]10 hours[/b]. There's also [b]the level editor[/b] that supports [b]Steam Workshop[/b] so you can create and download custom-made puzzle chambers.
